definitions: the quality of involving or being shared by all people or things in the world or in a particular group

examples.text: we affirm the universality of human rights
the universality of the experience of grief and loss
the principle of universality was abandoned in favor of means-tested payments

shortDefinitions: quality of applying to all people or things

definitions: the quality of being true in or appropriate for all situations

examples.text: the universality of the basic laws of mathematics

shortDefinitions: quality of being adjustable to or appropriate for all requirements
